medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started two days ago, initially diffuse but now localized primarily in the right lower quadrant, escalating in severity. Associated symptoms include nausea, malaise, anorexia, chills, and bloating.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), migraine headaches, submandibular stones, hypothyroidism
